item.title: UnrealEd 2.0 Critical Error
item.author: invalid@example.com (King_Frag)
item.dc:creator: King_Frag
item.content:encoded:
When I open UnrealEd, it says:

Critical Error:

General protection fault!

History: UEditorEngine::Init <- InitEngine

Anyone knows a solution?

Tx

item.title: Question about server stats...
item.author: invalid@example.com (TurboSi)
item.dc:creator: TurboSi
item.content:encoded:
I'm not sure if this is still an active forum but I'll post anyway and hopeI can get an answer.

I do maps for Truff's (www.truff.net) and recently I created a portal map on a dedicated server that people can use as a gateway to the other servers. I decided to update the map and give it real time server stats for all the servers it has access to. Screen 131 is the perfect solution but I've run into a technical difficulty maybe.
I need to run stats for 9 servers. I created to...

Question about server stats...

item.title: Only works in non dedicated?
item.author: invalid@example.com (LittleHorn)
item.dc:creator: LittleHorn
item.content:encoded:
I am having a problem where if i run a listen server and connect to it, the screen server query will function correctly. This is also the case in single player mode.

If, however, i start a server and click dedicated, then join it, the server query does not work. This problem occurs on my server aswell as i have the Dedicated version of UT server installed as opposed to the whole game - so that i need not use graphics.

Why is it that screen server query isnt functioning in dedicated...

Only works in non dedicated?

item.title: tiled screens
item.author: invalid@example.com (tarquin)
item.dc:creator: tarquin
item.content:encoded:
I've got a screen map to work, with a custom texture too! wahey!

slight problem with the tiling so far though. (I'm being dense )

Set the Width and Height properties of the master Screen actor to the total pixel width and height of the tiled scripted textures (not the total width and height of the screen brushes in world units). The slaves' Width and Height properties are ignored, so leave them as they are.
Click to expand...
have I got this right?
The master screen actor's...

tiled screens

item.title: Movies On The Screens
item.author: invalid@example.com ((HW)Stalker)
item.dc:creator: (HW)Stalker
item.content:encoded: Okay... have a really cool concept for a map but I need to know if there is a way to make a "movie" play on the screens... I would like to be able to play a recorded demo on a screen. I doubt this is possible but if it is can you tell me?? Thanks

item.title: Screen <--> Meshmaker
item.author: invalid@example.com (TheSpoonDog)
item.dc:creator: TheSpoonDog
item.content:encoded:
I've got one...

How about if I used a scriptedscreen.utx texture on a prefab, made it into a mesh with Meshmaker (tm) and used it in my level, added a screen actor and my desired ssranking/ssmap/ssweb... would this work? (I'm talking just one surface on a mesh, nothing stupid)

SpoonDog

item.title: Screen Question
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mychaeel)
item.dc:creator: Mychaeel
item.content:encoded:
DireIce wrote in the Jailbreak Development forum:
Mychaeel, I'm not complaining or anything, as the screens are an awesome feature, but is there anyway to use the map texture instead of using one of the Screen1 to Screen8 textures when creating a map surveillance slide?

I'm just wondering cause I noticed Snowdog did this in Freya][ but for the life of me I couldn't figure out how he got it to...
Click to expand...
Screen Question

item.title: suggestion
item.author: invalid@example.com (]Bs[Highlander)
item.dc:creator: ]Bs[Highlander
item.content:encoded:
well seeing as this is my first post here.. hi
/me waves

now.. while working on a map for unreal fortress i decided to give screens a try and first off....

DAMN NICE really REALLY nice idea

now my only wish list would be some way of changing the "alignment" of the screen in game.. what i mean is the most time consuming part ive found is setting up the screen actor to have the right dimensions and centering the slide correctly

would it be possible to have say a mutator or...

suggestion

item.title: diagram
item.author: invalid@example.com (tarquin)
item.dc:creator: tarquin
item.content:encoded:
Being a mathematician, I think in pictures .
I would have had to scribble out a diagram of what goes on at some point anyway to understand the relationships between the different elements -- as it is I've made it in Freehand so it's nice & neat & everyone can appreciate it

I may have got it completely wrong -- if Mychaeel corrects my inept mistakes I'll be happy to make corrections
